145: I want to… check things upstairs and pray there as well. Although we missed the best time…
我想…上去看看，顺便参拜一下。虽然早已经错过新年参拜的时日了……
I want to... go up and take a look, and pay my respects to the shrine. Although I've already missed the New Year's visit...
We are just carrying out a task today… Nevermind, it won't take us too long.
但是我们只是来这里执行任务的说……算啦，如果只是参拜的话应该也不需要多少时间，只要不被发现就好啦~
But we're just here to carry out a mission... Never mind. If it's just a visit, it shouldn't take too long. As long as we don't get caught, it'll be fine.
Why do you want to do that?
芽衣为什么会想着在这里参拜呢？神社不是到处都有吗？
Why do wanna visit the shrine here, Mei? Aren't there shrines everywhere?
这就是一个很长的故事了呢……
I have a strange feeling when I get back to this place again…
再次回到这个地方，不知为何，总有种物是人非的感觉……
Coming back to this place again, I don't know why, but it feels like everything and everyone has changed...
Mei, you think too mcuh, let's gp!
芽衣你想太多了啦，我们快去参拜吧！
Mei, you're overthinking things. Let's just hurry to the shrine!
话说这里还真是冷清呢。
It's strange, what are you saying, I can't understand you?
奇怪，也没有发烧啊……怎么就开始说胡话了呢？
It's strange, you don't have a fever... Why'd you start talking nonsense?
There was a Houkai impact here, so we can't find any person.
这地方可是发生了崩坏诶，当然不会有人的啦~
This place has succumbed to the Honkai, so of course no one is here~
Seems there are some people here~
看来还是会有人来参拜的嘛~
It seems that there's still people coming to visit~
这不科学，现在都不是参拜的时候，更何况长空市已经无人生还了，怎么可能……
This is literally unscientific. Now isn't the time to pay homage. Moreover, no one survived in Nagazora. How could this be possible...
Let's go to check it out!
Wouldn’t we know for sure if we just follow them?
146: It's boring since I became the No.1 in the world. Kurokaede, Shirosakura, do you have the same feeling?
自天下无敌手之后，这乐趣便也少了许多。黑枫小姐，白樱小姐，你们一直跟着在下也不会腻么？
Ever since I became invincible, the fun has diminished considerably. Lady Shirosakura, Lady Kurokaede, aren't you tired of following me around everywhere?
能够跟随芽衣殿下行走天下。
Being able to travel around the world with Lady Mei is a pleasure.
It's more funny compare to stay at Izu.
总比一直呆在伊豆要有趣得多。
It's much more interesting than staying in Izu all the time.
哈哈哈…二位既然这么说，是在下的荣幸。
Hahahaha... Since you two say so, it is my honor.
I'm just a ronin. The only thing I'm interested in is fight…
可是在下只是空有这一身武艺的浪人，也只有战斗能挑起在下的兴趣了……
But I am just a ronin with nothing but martial arts skills, and only fighting can arouse my interest...
We can take to enjoy the mountain and sea.
那倒不如换我姐妹二人带领大人游山玩水如何？
How about letting the two of us take you on a sightseeing tour?
虽然我们也不过只是长居家门而不出的除妖师，就怕……
Even though we're just demon hunters who stay at home all the time, we're afraid...
I'm glad to do that. Oh, it's a shrine, let's take a rest there.
二位小姐有这份心，在下已经心满意足了。前方应该就是此地的神社，我们前去那休息一番吧。
I'm quite pleased that you two ladies are so kind. The shrine should be up ahead. Let's go there and rest for a while.
Oh, she is…Hokushin Mei… What is she doing here?
那个人是…北辰芽衣……她怎么会出现在这里？
That person is... Hokushin Mei... Why is she here?
Ah, are we going back to the ancient again?
难道我们再次回到了古代？
Are we back in ancient times again?
我们追上去问个清楚吧。
Let’s catch up and find out.
147: I felt there was someone following us. It's you…
从刚才就察觉了后面有人跟着了，不过居然是你……
I've noticed someone following me a while back, but turns out it's you...
Hokushin Mei… Glad to meet you again.
北辰小姐，我们又见面了。
Long time no see, little girl.
真是好久不见，传承了“北辰一刀流”的雷电家的小娃娃。
It’s been a long time since I saw you, young woman from the Raiden family who inherited the "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu" art.
What are you doing here with Kurokaede and Shirosakura?
北辰小姐为何会出现在这里？而且还和黑枫白樱她们在一起？
Why are you here, Hokushin-san? And why are you with Kurokaede and Shirosakura?
还有那两个，她们不是已经死掉了嘛。
And those two, aren’t they supposed to be dead?
What are you saying? We have travelled for monthes. Why do you say they were dead?
你在说什么胡话？我和两位小姐已经结伴同行数月，你却说两位小姐已经死去？
What nonsense are you talking about? I have been traveling with these two ladies for months, and you say they are dead?
Wait a second, I need to teach them a lesson.
等一下，芽衣殿下，这种程度的敌人的话，还是让我们自己来教训教训吧。
Wait a minute, Lady Mei. For an enemy of this level, let us teach them a lesson ourselves.
I don't like their words about us.
毕竟有人说我们已经死去了，心中还是有些不快的。
After all, you said we were already dead. That leaves a bitter taste in my heart.
Hey! We just said the truth.
喂！你们怎么不分青红皂白就要打啊，我只是说了实话而已啊！
Hey! Why are you attacking us without knowing the full truth? I was just being honest!
You still dare to talk nonsense. Watch yourself!
Nevermind, they become much stronger than before.
没事，黑枫小姐不需要道歉。是她们变强了。
It's okay, you need to apologize, Lady Kurokaede. They've become stronger.
她不会有事的，北辰一刀流和其他孱弱的剑法不一样。
She will be fine. Hokushin Ittou-ryuu is different from other weak sword techniques.
I'm fine, Kiana, don't worry about me.
我没事，琪亚娜，让你担心了。
I don't know why you said that to us, but if you want to find the answer, maybe you can check the shrine.
小辈，虽然在下不知道汝为什么会对我们的存在感到质疑，但是汝想搜寻的答案可能就在上方。
Young ladies, although I don’t know why you doubt our existence, the answer you are looking for may be right ahead.
Do you mean the shrine in front of us?
上面，你是说，那间神社吗？
Right ahead? You mean the shrine?
Yes, do you want to get into it and check it with us?
没错，不知汝愿不愿意和在下一起去探查一番呢？
That’s correct. I wonder if you would like to go and investigate with us?
好！那事不宜迟，我们出发吧！
Okay! Let's go without further ado!
You still love to help us, just like the old times.
浪人汝还是这么喜欢管闲事啊。
Ronin, you still like to meddle in other people's affairs.
That's also the reason for why we would like to join her.
要不是这样我们也不会跟着她一起行天下不是么？
If it weren't for that, we wouldn't be traveling around the world with her, wouldn't we?
148: I see. It happened in your memory…
原来如此，原来在汝的记忆中发生过这样的事……
So that's how it is. So something like this happened in your memory...
Do you believe it? It's weird…
你相信了？明明是这么离谱的事？
You believe me? It isn't absurd to you?
I believe you. You helped me, although we are not in the same time. It's also possible we have the different memories about this.
在下有什么不相信的理由么？虽然汝说的故事与在下记忆中的事有偏差，但那并不是不可能发生的事不是么？毕竟汝等曾穿越了时光帮助了在下。
Is there any reason for me not to believe it? Although your story differs from what I remember, it's not impossible, is it? After all, you have traveled through time to help me.
I also travel for those weird things.
多亏了这么有意思的事情我才会想要继续行遍天下呢，说不定又会碰到什么奇妙的事了。
Thanks to such interesting happenings, I want to continue traveling around the world. Maybe I will encounter something extraordinary again.
However, I haven't met any weird things this time.
但是浪人汝目前还什么都没有遇到啊。
But Ronin hasn't encountered anything yet.
What are you saying? Now the weird thing is in front of you.
妹妹说什么呢，芽衣殿下这不是遇上了么。
What are you talking about, Sister? Lady Mei has encountered this.
Mei, let's go. They speak too much.
芽衣，我们快上山吧，这些人说话这么慢吞吞的，我实在受不了了。
Mei, let's go up the mountain quickly. These people talk too formally, I really can't stand it anymore.
You go first, Kiana, I still have some other things to say with Hokushin.
那琪亚娜你先上去吧，我和北辰小姐还有些话要说。
You go up first then, Kiana. I need to discuss something with Hokushin-san.
What a smart girl… I'm curious about the time change… Do you know anything?
真是个好懂的小姑娘啊…不过我也有些好奇到底是什么缘由又让时空扭曲了，黑枫小姐，白樱小姐，你们怎么看？
What an understanding girl... But I am also a little curious about what caused the distortion of time and space again. Lady Kurokaede, Lady Shirosakura, what do you think?
Yeah, what's the reason for this? The only thing we know about is it must related to "emotion".
是啊，会是什么呢？不过有一点可以确定的是，那一定是某种非常强烈的“情感”吧。
Yes, what could it be? But one thing is certain, it must be some very strong "emotion".
149: Mei, it's just a ruin, I don't think we can find the answer there.
芽衣，这个地方都荒废了那么久，怎么可能会有什么秘密嘛，她们不会是在骗我们吧。
Mei, this place has been abandoned for so long, how could there be any secrets? Are they lying to us?
How dare you say that to Hokushin?!
How dare you be rude to Her Excellency!
Relax, Kiana, I have the feeling we must find something there.
放心吧，琪亚娜，我也隐隐有种感觉，这里有什么东西在等待着我。
Don't worry, Kiana, I also have a vague feeling that something is waiting for us here.
Stop talking, there are some people.
这里的石阶有些陡，还是小心一点为好。
These stone steps here are a bit steep, so make sure to he careful.
啧啧啧，真是温馨的家庭呢。
Ha? The kid looks like Mei, and she called herself "Mei" too~~ What a little "Mei", awesome!
咦？那个孩子长得跟芽衣好像啊，也自称芽衣呢~居然还有这么小的芽衣，真是太棒了！
Huh? That kid looks just like Mei, and she even calls herself Mei! There's actually a Mei this young! Awesome!
Father… Why he is here too… He is de… And me, the 8-year-old me…
父亲大人……为什么也会出现在这里…他不是已经…还有八岁的我……
Father... Why is he here too...? And he's... with me, when I was an eight-year-old...
咦，那个大叔是芽衣的父亲吗？这么说就是……岳父大人咯？！
Wait, so that's your father, Mei? Then... he's my future father-in-law?!
哦呀哦呀，好像有什么非常有意思的事情发生了呢~
Oh my, it seems like something very interesting has just occured~
We must figure the whole thing out.
这说不定是改变我和芽衣关系的重要一步，上天把我送到这个地方来，一定是为了促成我和芽衣结婚的！岳父大人我来了！！
This may be an important step in changing the relationship between me and Mei. God sent me to this place to facilitate my marriage with Mei! Father-in-law, here I come!!
What time is it now? Are you travelling to another time?
这里究竟是哪个时代？又或者这里其实并不是那个时间点？
What time period is this place in? Or is this not actually that time?
Kiana, let's go to check it out.
琪亚娜，我们去调查清楚吧！
150: Mei, please watch your mouth after we entering this shrine.
芽衣，等会进入神社之后一定要慎言慎行，虽然这里已经早已荒废了，但……
Mei, you must be careful with your words and actions when entering the shrine. Although this place has long been abandoned, it's still...
Who are you! I don't understand your words.
你是什么人！怎么满口胡言乱语？
Who are you?! Why are you talking nonsense?
Hello, I'm a friend of Mei. I want to marry Mei, please promise me.
岳父大人好，我是芽衣的朋友，是注定要和芽衣结婚的人，请岳父大人成全！
Hello, father-in-law. I am Mei's friend and the one destined to marry her. Please grant my blessing!
Mei's friend? Mei, do you know her?
芽衣的朋友？芽衣你认识这个人么？
Mei's friend? Mei, do you know this person?
No, I don't know her, father.
不，我不认识她，父亲大人。
简直就像是一个模子中造出来的，不过果然还是小芽衣更棒啊！！！
It's like they were made from the same mold, but my Mei is still better after all!!!
What do you want to do with my daughter?
你想对我的女儿做什么！？
What are you planning on doing to my daughter?!
Mei, give this rude person a lesson,but don't kill her.
芽衣，给这个无礼的人一点教训吧，不过不要伤到她了。
Mei, teach this rude person a lesson, but make sure not to kill her.
Miss, please tell your friend don't do that… Otherwise, I will give her a lesson.
小姑娘，请管管你的朋友，让她不要再来骚扰我的女儿了，否则别怪我不客气。
Young lady, please control your friend and tell her not to harass my daughter again, otherwise don't blame me for being rude.
Mei, it's not like what you think… I'm just…
芽衣，那个…不是这样的，我只是……
Mei, that's... that's not it. I just...
Wait a second… Your name is Mei? You used Hokushin Itto-ryu, it's the ougi of my family, how do you know that?
等一下……你叫芽衣？而且刚才你使用的应该也是“北辰一刀流”吧，这门剑法是我雷电家的家传绝学，你又是从何处习得的？

Wait a minute... your name is Mei? And I believe you were using "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu" just now, right? That sword technique is a family tradition passed down by clan, the Raiden family. Where did you learn it from?
Ah, it's finished. I was wondering maybe we can see a good fight…
啊啦，看来好像已经打完了，还以为能看见一场精彩的对决呢。
Ahh, it seems like the duel is over. I thought I would see an exciting showdown.
I'm just a passenger, I created "Hokushin Itto-ryu".
在下不过是一个过路人，硬要说上一种身份的话，我算是“北辰一刀流”的创始人吧。
I am just a passer-by. If I have to state an identity, you may know me as the founder of "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu".
You created it? Are you Hokushin Mei? You can't live so long.
创始人？莫非你是北辰芽衣？但是那可是战国时期出名的武士，你怎么可能活到现在？
Founder? Could you be Hokushin Mei? But she was a famous warrior from the Sengoku Period. How could you possibly be alive today?
If you are saying the truth. I still don't know the identity of the girl nearby, she looks like my daughter.
就算我姑且相信你所说的，但是你身边那位小姑娘身份也是不明不白，她又是谁？为什么和我的女儿如此相像？
Even if I believe what you said, the identity of the young woman next to you is unclear. Who is she? Why does she look so much like my daughter?
父亲……大人，父亲大人，我是芽衣啊！我……
Fa...ther, Father, it's me, Mei! I'm...
What happened to you, Mei? Do you recall anything?
芽衣你怎么了？从刚刚起你就在发呆，现在又突然喊“父亲大人”，是想起了什么吗？
Mei, what's wrong with you? You've been in a daze since a while ago, and now you're suddenly calling out "Father". Did you remember something?
That's… Kiana, I'm fine, don't worry.
刚才的那些是……琪亚娜，我没事的，不用担心。
So what happened just now was... Kiana, I'm fine, don't worry.
Humph… You still haven't told me why you want to pray here.
嗯！但是你还没有告诉我为什么会来这里参拜呢~
Alright! But you still haven't told me why you came here to pray~
芽衣你怎么了，刚才还好好的，怎么发了一会呆就变这样了……
Mei, what's wrong with you? You were fine before, why'd you start acting weird after being dazed for a while...
Nothing… About the story, maybe we can find another time… You know, it's a long story.
那个啊…真的没什么的，至于那个故事嘛…果然还是要算了吧，那个故事太长了，琪亚娜你恐怕会不耐烦的呢~
That's... it's really nothing. As for that story... just forget about it. It's too long. I'm afraid you'd be too impatient, Kiana~
好啦好啦，快上去吧。再在这里停留的话被发现我们在偷懒就不好了。
Alright, alright, let's go on ahead. If we stay here any longer, it'll be bad if we're caught slacking off.
151: Oh, it's just a dream, I feel I met a lot in the dream, but it's just happened for 1 second in the real life…
果然刚才的是一场梦么，总感觉过了很长一段时间，但现实中却不过是一瞬……
Was it really just a dream? It felt like a long time had passed, but in reality it was only a moment...
果然美好的东西总是虚幻的呢……
As expected, beautiful things are always fleeting...
Mei… What happened ? I really want to know.
芽衣你又在皱眉头了！果然刚才发生了什么事对吧？
Mei, you're frowning again! That must mean something happened just now, right?
不是那么重要的事啦，只是…稍微在想一些问题而已。
It's not that important, I'm just... thinking about some things.
What happened? Kiana, stop looking at me like that.
怎…怎么了？琪亚娜，这么盯着我看。
What... what's wrong? Kiana, why are you staring at me like that?
Although I know there's something Mei doesn't want to tell me, howevet, nevermind. Mei, be positive.
虽然知道芽衣有什么在瞒着我，但是如果芽衣不想告诉我的话就算啦。但是芽衣，情感这种东西，无论是积极的还是消极的都不能在心中积压太久哦~
I know you're is hiding something from me, Mei, but if you don't want to tell me, then that's okay. But Mei, emotions, whether positive or negative, shouldn't be kept inside for too long.
I'm always open to you, you can tell me everything you want.
所以如果你想找个人倾诉的话，就告诉我吧，我会认真听着的！
So if you need someone to talk to, just talk to me and I'll listen!
You must read those words from other books. It's not like what you would say.
刚才那句话肯定是从那本书上照抄过来的吧？这可不像琪亚娜会说的话呢。
That sentence must have been copied from that book, right? It doesn't sound like something you would normally say, Kiana.
152: There are not many changes here, just like the old times.
这里和以前来的时候一样，没什么变化呢。
It's the same here as it was before, not much has changed.
We haven't left here for a long time too~
毕竟离开长空市的时间也不长嘛，这里当然不会有什么变化啦~
Well, it hasn't been long since we escaped Nagazora, so of course nothing here has changed.
When I was a kid, my fathere took me to this place…
依稀记得在很小的时候，父亲大人曾经带我来过这里……
I vaguely remember that my father brought me here when I was very young...
However, when I grew up, he never took me to this place again.
但是从那之后父亲大人再也没有带我来参拜过。
But after that, my father never brought me to visit this shrine again.
That's it, you choose this place to pray and then you missed your father.
原来是这样，所以你才选择来这里参拜，然后就想你爸爸了对吧。
So that's why you chose to come here to pray. Because you missed your father, right?
Otherwise, you won't shot like that: "Father!" Yeah, that must be the reason.
要不然你也不会突然喊出“父亲大人”这种话了，嗯！一定是这样的！
Otherwise, you wouldn't have suddenly called out "Father." Yeah! That must be the case!
… You are right… At some points… However, your words makes me feel strange.
……这么说是没错啦，不过为什么感觉这话说得那么奇怪呢？
...That's true, but why does it sound so strange?
Don't care too much about the details…
不过你说的可能是对的呢。
也许，我真的在想念他吧……
Maybe I just really miss him...
153: 目标人物发现。正在发送人物报告。
Bronya? Are you trying to find us?
布洛妮娅？你是来找我们的么？
Bronya? Are you here to find us?
Just detected some Houkai energy here, Himeko asked me to check it out and find you.
刚才检测到这个区域有轻微的崩坏能的波动，姬子少校让我前来调查，顺便来找你们。
I only detected a slight fluctuation of Honkai Energy in this area. Major Himeko asked me to come and investigate, and I noticed you were here also.
Oh, seems we have no time to pray.
偷懒被发现了呢，看来今天是没法再参拜了呢。
We've been spotted slacking off. Seems I can’t visit the shrine today.
Kiana, let's go. We will have another time to pray.
琪亚娜，我们回去吧，有机会的话再到这里来参拜就是了。
Kiana, let's go back. We can come here to pay our respects again when we have the chance.
It's hard for me to stay with Mei alone, and this palce is full of your memories.
好不容易才能跟芽衣单独相处，而且这里也是芽衣充满回忆的地方。
It's so hard to be alone with Mei, and this is also a place full of memories for you.
就不能让我们参拜完吗？
Can't we just finish paying respects?
Stop it, Kiana. I won't let you take Mei away.
琪亚娜你不要再说了。我是不会让你把芽衣姐姐带走的。
Kiana, enough talking. I won't let you take Mei away.
Looks like I'll have to force it then!
Self checking… Energy: 87%, Armored Bunny 19C: 78% HP…
自我检测中……能源消耗13%，重装小兔受损程度22%，其余功能状态良好。
Self-examination in progress... Energy consumption: 13%. Damage to Armored Bunny: 22%. All other functions in good condition.
Great, you are fine… Kiana, you are so impulsive!
没事就好…琪亚娜你为什么这么冲动？
I'm glad you're okay... Kiana, why are you so impulsive?
She tried stop you. That's the place full of your memories, but…
但是她不是拦着芽衣不让你去参拜吗？明明是充满着过去的回忆的地方，但是……
But didn't she prevent you from visiting, Mei? It's clearly a place filled with your memories, but...
You shouldn't do that… She is our sister.
那也不能把枪口指向她啊，布洛妮娅可是我们的同伴啊。
But you can't point a gun at her, Bronya is our comrade.
Great, you are fine… Kiana, you are so impulsive!
Although memories is very precious, however, in this Houkai world, friendship is also very valuable.
回忆虽然是很可贵的东西，但是在这不断被崩坏侵蚀的世界中，在患难中共同进退的友情才是更可贵的！
Memories are precious, but in this world that is constantly threatened by the Honkai, friendship that stands together through thick and thin is even more precious!
After you joined our team, we treated you as our friend, teammate. Do you know that, Kiana?
尤其是在你们已经加入了我的小队之后，朋友也好，战友也好，这份情谊才是维持我们这个小队和谐的重要因素！琪亚娜，你知道了吗？
Especially now that you've joined my squad, whether as friends or comrades, companionship is the most important factor in maintaining harmony in our squad! Kiana, do you understand?
You got it, just go to the shrine and pray now.
知道了就好，那么我们就去参拜吧。
That's good to know. Now let's go and pay our respects.
Himeko, you are not taking us back?
姬子少校你不是来带我们回去的吗？
Major Himeko, aren't you here to take us back?
I just wanted to check the Houkai energy here and I found there is nothing here. So, you can pray in the shrine.
本来我是探测到这里有崩坏能的波动反应，又发现你们不在，才让布洛妮娅过来看看。不过现在看来这里什么事都没发生的样子，那为什么我不能体谅一下我的部下呢？

Originally, I detected a Houkai Energy fluctuation here, and when I realized you weren't with us, I sent Bronya over to check. But now it seems like nothing's wrong here, so why can't I be more considerate of my subordinates?
Do it fast, Theresa is waiting us.
快走吧，学园长还在前面等着呢。
Let's go quickly, the principal is still waiting for us.
154: Theresa, don't act just like a kid.
学园长，请不要总像个小孩子一样玩心这么重。
Principal, enough acting all childish and goofing off.
No… I did my job very well!
哪…哪里玩了，我可是有好好调查的好不好！
What... What do you mean "goofing off"? I have done a thorough investigation, alright?
*Cough* I already knew who made the Houkai energy here! It's you!
咳咳……这一次在这里发生的小型崩坏反应我已经知道是谁引起的了！凶手就是你！
Ahem... I already know who caused this minor Honkai reaction here! The culprit is you!
喂！大姨妈，你干嘛指着芽衣啊。
Hey! Auntie, why are you pointing at Mei?
Yes, it's you. It may effect in dream or something like that…
虽然这么说可能不准确，但的确是你——雷电芽衣引起了这地方的一些变故，具体的表现形式可能是幻境、梦境之类的，但是我却找不到发生此类现象的痕迹。

Although this may not be accurate, it is true that you, Raiden Mei, affected this place in some way. The specific manifestations may be illusions, dreams, etc., but I can't find any trace of such phenomena.
An illusion... huh, so that's how it is.
看来你似乎有一些头绪了？
It seems like you have an idea?
I just saw my father, 8-year-old me and Hokushin Mei…
就在刚才，我看见了我的父亲，还有小时候的我，还有之前曾经遇到过的“北辰一刀流”的创始人，还有两位除妖师小姐……
Just now, I saw my father, myself as a child, the founder of the "Hokushin Ittou-ryuu" sword art whom I had met before, and two young demon hunters...
Oh, they should not appear here…
因为确实太过不可思议，而且出现的都是不可能出现在现世的人物……
It's truly too unbelievable — it's impossible for those people to appear in this time and space...
Maybe you miss someone so much.
不过结合学园长的推测，我想可能是因为某种名为“思念”的感情而引发的吧。
However, combined with your speculation, Principal, I think it might be caused by some kind of emotion called "missing".
Yes, it must be "Miss", we find the reason!
强烈的情感波动的确是崩坏能波动的原因之一，那么这一次小规模崩坏的调查就此告终！
Strong emotional fluctuations are indeed one of the reasons for the fluctuation of Honkai Energy, so this small-scale investigation into Honkai Energy can now end here!
Let's go back to St. Freya HS now. Alright, before we go, we…
回到圣芙蕾雅之后芽衣你再去做个身体检测吧。不过现在……
Mei, you should get a physical examination after returning to St. Freyja. But for now...
就按照你们原定的计划，一起去参拜吧~
Let's go to the shrine together just like you planned~
155: Errrr. I think you just drop away your jobs…
所以说，真的不是因为学园长自己想要偷懒吗？
So, it’s really not because you just want to slack off, Principal?
No, I really want to pray here!
才没有！我可是带着十足的诚意来许愿的！
No way! I made this wish with all my heart!
Grow up, is that your wish?
哦？反正又是什么想让自己长大之类的不切实际的愿望吧。
Oh? I bet it's just some unrealistic wish like wanting to grow up.
Humph, your wish must be related to love.
哼！那你呢，肯定又许了跟恋爱相关的愿望了吧。
Hmph! What about you? You must have made another love-related wish.
Your wish is "Find a boyfriend" every year, however, you never find one.
每年都在求神拜佛保佑自己找个男朋友，结果不还是这个样子。
Every year, you wish for God to bless you and find a boyfriend, but the results are always the same.
Theresa master, you shouldn't say that to Himeko.
学园长，你怎么能这样说姬子少校呢？是不是有点过分了？
Principal, how could you say that about Major Himeko? Isn't that a bit too much?
I think she said bad words about me first!
为什么说我啊！明明是她先嘲讽我长不大的好不好！
Why are you blaming me? She was the one who mocked me for not growing up first!
Theresa, I think you are popular in our school~
但是大姨妈你平时不是经常穿着修女服在学校晃荡吗？好像还很受欢迎的样子！
But Auntie, don't you often hang around school in a nun's uniform? You seem to be quite popular!
However, you can see Himeko, as a girl, she is not so popular…
但是你看姬子少校，身为一个女孩子，不受欢迎也就算了……
But look at Major Himeko, as a girl, not being popular is one thing but... (TN: idk how to make this sound more natural)
And she always has a lot of missions.
还经常被指派各种各样的任务，共计317个。
She's also frequently assigned various tasks, totaling 317.
I know you are trying to help me, but you should not say those things…
虽然我知道你们在帮我说话，但是好歹给我留一点面子吧……
Although I know you are speaking for me, please at least give me some face...
Well, well, well, you are all helping this oppai monster…
很好，很好，你们今天居然都在帮这个欧派妖怪说话……
Very good, very good, you are all speaking up for this oppai monster today...
I think I must use Judah to give you a lesson!
看来得用犹大的誓约教会你们如何尊师敬长了！
Looks like I need to use the Oath of Judas to teach you how to respect your teachers and elders!
呼——久违的活动筋骨，真是让人浑身舒畅啊~
Phew— It’s been a long time since I last stretched my muscles. I feel a lot more at ease now~
Humph! Your weapon is better than us!
哼！就仗着自己有一把好武器。
Hmph! It's only because you have a better weapon.
可恶！居然还是打不过她！
Damn it! I still can’t beat her!
想打过我？你们还是太嫩了啊！我当初可是留了很多力的~
Beat me? You're still too inexperienced! I was holding back a lot of my strength, y'know~
Alright, stop that. Don't fight in front of the shrine~
好啦好啦，这些东西就不要纠结了，在人家神社面前打打杀杀多不好~
Alright, alright, no need to dwell on it. It's not nice to fight and kill in front of someone's shrine~
Stop… I think Theresa has a good mood mow, stop talking.
嘘……学园长现在心情貌似很不错的样子，还是不要自找麻烦了。
Shh... The principal seems to be in a good mood right now, so it's better not to cause any trouble.
Kiana, Bronya, let's go to pray.
琪亚娜，布洛妮娅，我们去参拜吧。
Kiana, Bronya, let's go to the shrine.
Fine, you are lucky this time.
算了，不跟那个小鬼头一般见识。
Forget it, I won’t bother with that little brat.
This place looks just like ruin. However, we still have chances to make our wishes come true. Let's go to pray… Wait me!
就算这个地方已经破败了，没有神明，但是祈愿什么的总还是会有可能成功的嘛！所以我们还是去参拜……人呢？喂！你们等等我！！
Even though this place is dilapidated and devoid of deities, there's still a chance that our wishes will come true! So let's go pay our respects anyway... Wait, where'd they go? Hey! Wait for me!
琪亚娜，你刚才没有认真参拜吧？
Kiana, you didn't pay your respects seriously just now, did you?
Oh no, I just focus on Mei, forgot to make a wish!
糟了，刚才光顾着偷看芽衣，忘记许愿了！
Oh no, I was so busy peeking at Mei that I forgot to make a wish!
Errrr, yeah I made a wish~
没…没有啊，我可是好好按照芽衣你说的做了哦~
N-...No, I did exactly as you said, Mei~
She is lying, she was watching you.
琪亚娜在说谎，她刚才是在偷偷看芽衣姐姐。
Kiana is lying. She was secretly looking at Mei just now.
Humph? How do you know that?
嗯？那布洛妮娅你又是怎么知道的呢？
Hmm? And how do you know that, Bronya?
Mei is important to me, I wish her happy forever~
因为芽衣姐姐是我重要的人，布洛妮娅希望芽衣姐姐能够幸福。
Because Mei is such an important person, Bronya wishes that Mei will be happy.
I want to make another one!
好狡猾！我也要重新许愿！
So cunning! I want to make a new wish too!
I want to marry her! I want to live with Mei forever! I want to…
我要和芽衣结婚！我要和芽衣永远在一起！我要和芽衣幸福的生活！我要……
I wish to marry Mei! I wish to be with Mei forever! I wish to live a happy life with Mei! I wish...
Enough! Don't say those embarrassed things~
行啦行啦，这么害羞的事不要这么大声的说出来啊！而且这么多愿望神明是会觉得厌烦的啦~
Okay, okay, don't say such embarrassing things out loud! Besides, the gods will get annoyed with so many wishes~
It is really good to be young.
See, you always envy others and do nothing, how dreams come true?
你看，你总是羡慕别人，又不自己行动，愿望怎么会实现嘛！
You see, if you always envy others but don’t take action yourself, how can your wishes come true?
Fine, I don't want to stay here. I think I can beat 100 zombies girls now.
走啦走啦，别在这继续当电灯泡了，还是找点儿活干啊。刚才打了一场，现在感觉可以一口气干掉一百只崩坏兽呢！
C'mon, let's stop being third wheels and find something to do. I just fought a battle, and now I feel like I could kill a hundred Honkai Beasts in one go!
Don’t give me that flat, half-assed line reading!!
